answers.answer: Hi,Thanks for writing in. With your symptoms it is clearly evident that you are having polyuria and polydipsia. This could happen due to diabetes mellitus type 1or 2, diabetes insipidus. I would suggest that you get a check of fasting and post lunch blood sugars for confirmation of diagnosis.Consult a physician for further assistance.Best.
